verses.roman:
rāga-mārge bhakta bhakti kare ye prakāre
tāhā śikhāiba līlā-ācaraṇa-dvāre

synonyms: rāga-mārge—on the path of spontaneous love; bhakta—the devotee; bhakti—devotional service; kare—does; ye prakāre—in what way; tāhā—that; śikhāiba—I shall teach; līlā—pastimes; ācaraṇa-dvāre—by means of practical demonstration.
translation: "I shall teach devotional service, which springs from the spontaneous love of the devotees, by demonstrating it Myself with My pastimes.
